purpose: To parse and handle partial JSON outputs from language models, facilitating more robust data handling in AI applications.
principle: Utilizes custom parsing logic to manage and interpret incomplete JSON structures, ensuring data integrity and usability in streaming contexts.
reusability: Offers a modular library that can be integrated into JavaScript/TypeScript applications for improved JSON handling in AI workflows.
limitations: May not fully recover severely malformed JSON; primarily designed for use with streaming language model outputs.
name: partial-json-parser-js
description: Parse partial JSON generated by LLM
highlight: Efficiently parses incomplete or malformed JSON generated during LLM interactions.
